question: 戦禍
sourceMnemonic: One of the most <kanji>evil</kanji> things about <kanji>war</kanji> are the <vocabulary>war damages</vocabulary> that happen during it. Whole countrysides, cities, and lots of people can die. So I'd say the <vocabulary>ravages of war</vocabulary> are the most evil thing about war. Period.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
